channel.title: Fran Drescher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fran Drescher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues’ Review: An Enjoyably Nostalgic Sequel That’s More Chuckle-Inducing Than Guffaw-Inspiring
item.description: Christopher Guest, Michael McKean, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner reprise their roles in this follow-up to the 1984 cult classic mockumentary ‘This Is Spinal Tap.’

item.title: ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues’ Review: An Enjoyably Nostalgic Sequel That’s More Chuckle-Inducing Than Guffaw-Inspiring
item.description: Christopher Guest, Michael McKean, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner reprise their roles in this follow-up to the 1984 cult classic mockumentary ‘This Is Spinal Tap.’

item.title: Fran Drescher Is “Ready to Do Other Things” After Four Years as SAG President, Says Union “Is in Fantastic Shape, Far Better Than When I Showed Up”
item.description: The ‘Nanny’ star explained why she’s not running for SAG-AFTRA president again this year while walking the carpet for ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: Fran Drescher Is “Ready to Do Other Things” After Four Years as SAG President, Says Union “Is in Fantastic Shape, Far Better Than When I Showed Up”
item.description: The ‘Nanny’ star explained why she’s not running for SAG-AFTRA president again this year while walking the carpet for ‘Spinal Tap II: The End Continues.’

item.title: Timothée Chalamet Introduces Gwyneth Paltrow to High-Stakes Ping-Pong in ‘Marty Supreme’ Trailer
item.description: Tyler, the Creator and Fran Drescher also star in Josh Safdie’s feature that hits theaters later this year from A24.

item.description: Tyler, the Creator and Fran Drescher also star in Josh Safdie’s feature that hits theaters later this year from A24.

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Seek Another Term as SAG-AFTRA President
item.description: After four years in charge, Fran Drescher will not seek another term as president of SAG-AFTRA. Drescher’s decision has been known within the union for some time. But it was made official on Fri

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Seek Another Term as SAG-AFTRA President
item.description: After four years in charge, Fran Drescher will not seek another term as president of SAG-AFTRA. Drescher’s decision has been known within the union for some time. But it was made official on Fri

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Run for SAG-AFTRA President As Candidates Line Up for Race
item.description: A list of national political candidates at the union, released Friday, confirmed that the labor group’s erstwhile strike leader is not seeking reelection.

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Run for SAG-AFTRA President As Candidates Line Up for Race
item.description: A list of national political candidates at the union, released Friday, confirmed that the labor group’s erstwhile strike leader is not seeking reelection.
